original_text: Daniel answered in the presence of the king, and said, The secret which the king hath demanded cannot the wise men, the astrologers, the magicians, the soothsayers, shew unto the king;
korean_text: 다니엘이 왕 앞에 대답하여 이르되 왕이 물으신 바 은밀한 것은 지혜자나 술객이나 박수나 점쟁이가 능히 왕께 보일 수 없으되

sentences.original_text: Daniel answered in the presence of the king,
The secret which the king hath demanded
cannot wise men, astrologers, magicians, soothsayers,
